archimate:Deliverable.name: Draft Architecture Requirements Specification Doc (BlueSea)
archimate:Deliverable.documentation:
Quantitative page 18 of Blue Sea Delivrables.pdf
Architecture Requirement Specification Success Measures  Reduce Operating Costs  Installation of systems to link with supermarkets Architecture Requirements  Availability 24/7/365  Comply with Sustainability and other fish-related regulations  Connect Supply system direct to customer's system  Create a unified fish purchasing system  Create single system to handle all regions  Create unified Data Model to service all systems of business.
